subject: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
From: Mr. Paul Andrew
Nigeria National Petroleum Corporation, (NNPC)
49 Road Close A House 14,
Dolphin Estate, Ikoyi,
Lagos Nigeria.
Tel: +234-903-830-4325
Dear Sir,
I am sorry for contacting you through this medium without any previous
notice. I am a senior staff with Nigeria National Petroleum
Corporation, (NNPC).  My colleagues and I intentionally over-invoiced
a contract award to the tune of USD 50 Million. All arrangements have been
concluded on how to transfer this fund into a safe foreign account
after the original contractor has been fully paid. By virtue of our
Civil service code of conduct, serving officers are not allowed to
Operate foreign bank accounts.
This is why I am seeking your mutual involvement to work with me in
getting the over-invoiced sum USD 50 Million transferred into your foreign
Bank account for our benefit. Please indicate your interest via email
hence other modalities will be discussed. There is no risk involved
and the fund transfer will have full legal backup.
Please treat with utmost confidentiality.
Best Regard,
Regards
Paul Andrew
+234-903-830-4325

subject: Re:   From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Hello Paul Andrew,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, your proposal sounds quite interesting and I'm intrigued by the opportunity. However, I do have a few questions that I hope you wouldn't mind answering.

Firstly, could you please elaborate on how exactly this process would work? What would be my role in this operation? 

Secondly, you mentioned that there is no risk involved and the fund transfer will have full legal backup. Could you provide more details about this? How can we ensure that everything is done legally?

Lastly, what are the benefits for me in this operation? You mentioned it's for our benefit but didn't specify what exactly those benefits might be.

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
From: Mr. Paul Andrew
Nigeria National Petroleum Corporation, (NNPC)
49 Road Close A House 14,
Dolphin Estate, Ikoyi,
Lagos Nigeria.
Tel: +234-903-830-4325

Dear  Johnie,

Thank you for your prompt reply to my email business proposal. The
transaction in question is for us to handle and process for our mutual
benefit. It is basically a transaction that must be processed using
legitimate process which is where my position plays a vital role. Once
it is given legal backing, it is acceptable everywhere because it is a
fund that has origin and duly processed with adequate documentation to
support its legitimacy.

We are to share the proceeds of this transaction 50% apiece. I need
your total cooperation to get this transaction swiftly executed hence
I will be monitoring it directly from my office where the fund
originates without anyone having pre knowledge of my involvement.
Please keep the details of this deal to yourself alone to ensure
maximum success.

Please note that this transaction will bring us into a different life
thereby establishing a strong relationship that is built solidly on
absolute confidence, reliability and trustworthiness. It is also for
us to understand this is a deal even though it is obviously supported
with every legal document from various ministries.

We shall require  your telephone number and
your address and your personal identification.

The fund has already been moved to banco
caixa vaults in Madrid Spain for safety through the help of our former
central bank governor Dr. Godwin Emefiele.

I need your maximum cooperation to get this transaction to a logical
conclusion.

However I enclose my working ID for your perusal.
Regards,

Paul Andrew
+234-903-830-4325

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Hello Paul Andrew,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It sounds like an interesting proposal, although I must admit, some parts of it are a bit complex for me to understand fully.

You mentioned that this process is legitimate and has legal backing. Could you please elaborate more on this? What kind of legal documents are supporting this deal?

Also, you mentioned that the fund has been moved to banco caixa vaults in Madrid Spain. How did it end up there and why was it moved from Nigeria?

I'm sorry if my questions seem naive, but I believe understanding these details will help me better comprehend the whole process.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Dear Johnie,

In furtherance  to your mail just received . I want to update you more
about this transaction. I am fully the initiator of this transaction and I
am in full control of the fund before it was moved to Banco Caixa Vaults in
Madrid Spain.
This will be shared 50/50 apiece. I have made a special arrangement to move
the fund to any part of the world. I have  secured a special security
immunity Certificate and non inspection Tag to move the fund to any part of
the world without customs or security agents in any part of the world to
scan or verify the contents of the cargo.
I shall honestly wish to do this business with you. The Banco Caixa Madrid
Spain will arrange a special diplomat who will deliver the fund to your
country by diplomatic cash delivery.
This system will save the fund from the pre-eyes of the International
Monetary Agency and intermediary banks charges and your national bank's
huge taxation.  The fund will be delivered to you hamlesly to your doorstep.
I will be taking care of the round trip ticket of the special diplomat who
will deliver the fund to you. His hotel accommodation, Feeding and other
Logistics while in your country. Your only responsibility here is the
payment of custom duty when the special diplomat arrives in the airport in
your country.
The special diplomat will clear the cargos from the customs before
proceeding to your house or your office to deliver the fund to you. I wish
to hear from you, your opinion before we proceed. I will give you more
updates later when I hear from you. I will attach here in this message my
international passport for your perusal. I will also need your personal
identification.
It is very important that I know whom I am working with.
Awaiting your urgent response.
Paul Andrew.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Hello Paul Andrew,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting proposition you've put forth. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions, but I'm eager to learn more.

You mentioned a special diplomat who will deliver the fund to my country. Could you tell me more about this process? How does diplomatic cash delivery work exactly?

Also, you mentioned that my only responsibility would be the payment of custom duty when the special diplomat arrives in my country. Could you provide more details on this? What is the estimated cost of this custom duty?

I appreciate your willingness to share your passport for my perusal. However, as a matter of personal policy, I don't feel comfortable sharing my personal information online.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Dear Johnie,

Thank you for your mail. The contents are well noted. I do appreciate your
response to my mail and I want to assure you that you will not regret
anything about this transaction.
However, I have concluded all arrangements to bring the fund to your
country through a special diplomat sent from Banco Caixa Madrid Spain, who
will deliver the fund to your country. I will not be in a position to know
how much the custom duty is, rather the special diplomat will discuss with
the customs at the airport on arrival. He will be in position to tell you
how much it will cost to clear the cargo  ones he discusses with the
customs at the airport. However, as I told you earlier, I will take care of
other charges including the diplomat's round trip ticket, his hotel
accommodation and other logistics. With the arrangements on the ground
everything will be successful and there will be no problems  after I have
secured a security Immunity certificate and non inspectional security tag.

Everything is set, only you have to tell us when you will be ready to
receive  the diplomat  in your country.

Note, These are the requirements for the special diplomat. Your full name,
address, Telephone number and your personal identification. such as drivers
licence, work id or international passport. However, I attach herein  my
international passport for your perusal.

Waiting for your urgent response.
Paul Andrew.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Hello Paul Andrew,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting proposition you've put forth. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions, but I'm eager to learn more.

You mentioned a special diplomat who will deliver the fund to my country. Could you tell me more about this process? How does diplomatic cash delivery work exactly?

Also, you mentioned that my only responsibility here is the payment of custom duty when the special diplomat arrives in my country. Could you provide more details on how much this might cost and how it should be paid?

I appreciate your willingness to share your passport for my perusal. However, as a matter of personal policy, I don't feel comfortable sharing any personal information at this stage.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Hello Paul Andrew,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting proposition you've presented here. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions, but I'm eager to learn more.

You mentioned a special diplomat who will deliver the fund to my country. Could you tell me more about this process? How does diplomatic cash delivery work exactly?

Also, you mentioned that my only responsibility would be the payment of custom duty when the special diplomat arrives in my country. Could you provide an estimate of how much this might cost?

I appreciate your willingness to share your passport for my perusal. However, as a matter of personal policy, I don't feel comfortable sharing or receiving personal identification documents over email.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Hello Paul Andrew,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's quite interesting to hear about the process of transferring funds through a special diplomat from Banco Caixa Madrid Spain. I must admit, this is all new to me.

I'm curious, how does the diplomat manage to carry such large amounts of money? Is it safe for them? And what kind of security measures are in place to ensure that the funds reach their intended destination?

Also, you mentioned something about customs duty. Could you please elaborate on that? How is it calculated and who usually pays for it?

As for my readiness to receive the diplomat, I would need some time to prepare. Could you possibly give me an estimate of when they might arrive?

Regarding the information you requested, I'm afraid I can't provide those details at this moment due to privacy concerns. However, rest assured that once everything is set and we're ready to proceed, I will be more than willing to cooperate fully.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Hello Paul Andrew,

Thank you for your detailed email. It's quite an interesting proposition you've put forth. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these types of transactions, but I'm eager to learn more.

You mentioned a special diplomat who will deliver the fund to my country. Could you tell me more about this process? How does diplomatic cash delivery work exactly?

Also, you mentioned that my only responsibility would be the payment of custom duty when the diplomat arrives in my country. Could you provide an estimate of how much this might cost?

I appreciate your willingness to take care of the diplomat's round trip ticket and other logistics. That's very generous of you.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Dear Johnie,

Thanks for your mail. The contents are duly noted.  I have heard all you
said and I am willing to explain the details of this transaction to you.
As I told you earlier, this fund USD50 M was deposited with the Banco Caixa
Vaults in Madrid Spain. This bank has a special diplomat that delivers
important ornaments and special gift items that are deposited into the Bank
Vaults all over the world. They sort for Immunity clearance Certificate
from the Spanish Ministry of Foreign Affairs and also for non inspection
Tag. These two documents shall prevent customs and other security agents at
the airport from scanning or verifying the contents of the cargo.
I know that this information will be new to you. The custom duty is money
paid to the customs at the airport or seaport to release goods or cargo
imported into a country from another country. That amount paid to the
customs to seek the release of the goods or cargos is called custom duty
which you are  liable  to pay for the release of the cargo bearing the
fund, This will happen when the special diplomat  arrives at the airport in
your country.

I am surprised how you refused to open up to me. I am trusting a huge sum
of money to your care and you are afraid of sending your personal datas to
me. Honestly, I am for real, that is why I sent my work ID and my
International Passport to you for your verification. This transaction will
take the both of us to another level of life. I am prepared to spend the
rest of my life in the United states of america. When I arrive Usa i will
introduce many lucrative oil deals that will make us Financially World
class.
However, we are scheduled  to move this fund to your country on the 23th of
February 2024. All arrangements for the special diplomat  to deliver the
fund in your country have been concluded. We are waiting for your consent
before he will proceed.
Look forward to your urgent response.
Paul Andrew.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Hello Paul Andrew,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. I must admit, this is all very new to me and I'm trying my best to understand it all. 

So, if I understood correctly, the fund is currently in Banco Caixa Vaults in Madrid Spain and there are special diplomats who deliver these important items worldwide. They have immunity clearance and a non-inspection tag which prevents customs or other security agents from scanning or verifying the contents of the cargo. Is that correct?

You also mentioned something about custom duty. Is this something I would need to pay? And how much would it be? 

I apologize if I seemed hesitant before. It's just that this is a lot of information to take in and I want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Also, you mentioned arriving in the United States and introducing lucrative oil deals. Could you tell me more about these deals? What kind of investment would they require?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Dear Johnie,

Thanks for your mail. The contents are well comprehended. I am happy you
are gradually coming to terms with the idea of this transaction.

Honestly, I will definitely be in America once we conclude this
transaction, we will have an opportunity to discuss important business.
Don't worry, I will invite you to my hotel room for more business
discussion.
As I told you earlier, we can't know the cost of clearing the cargos now.
It is when the special diplomat arrives at the airport  the customs will
tell him the amount for customs duty. You will be furnished with the
information the moment he spoke to the customs at the airport. I am
surprised that you have not formally introduced yourself to me or sent the
information about yourself while I have already done that. I told you that
we scheduled 23th of  February 2024 to deliver the cargo, but you have not
said anything concerning the date of delivery of the cargo. Please let me
know your opinion about this.
Waiting for your urgent response.
Paul Andrew.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Hello Paul Andrew,

Thank you for your prompt response. I'm glad to hear that we're making progress with this endeavor. It's exciting to think about the potential business opportunities that could arise from this.

I understand that the cost of clearing the cargos will be determined upon arrival at the airport. That makes sense, and I appreciate your assurance that I'll be updated as soon as the customs duty amount is known.

As for my introduction, I apologize if it seemed like I was withholding information. My name is Johnie, and I'm very interested in exploring new business ventures, which is why your proposal caught my attention.

Regarding the scheduled delivery date in February, could you please provide more details? For instance, do we have a specific date or week in mind? Also, what should I expect during this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Dear Johnie,

Thanks for your mail. The contents are well noted. I would appreciate  if
you would open up to me and also release your contact information such as
your telephone number, your address  and your personal identification. We
need your address where you would like to receive the cargo. This is very
important because there is no way we will book a flight ticket without
knowing your city or the airport close to you where the special diplomat
will arrive.
We have already scheduled for the special diplomat to depart from Spain
Madrid on the  23th of  February 2024 but due to you not being able to
release information about yourself, we keep it pending  until when you are
ready to oblige  us with your personal information that will help us to
conclude this transaction.
I honestly came to you with a clean heart and I will like you to take me
and understand me as your business partner from now on.
Looking forward to your urgent response.
Paul Andrew.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Dear Paul Andrew,

Thank you for your prompt response and the detailed information. I'm really excited about this opportunity and appreciate your trust in me as a business partner.

I understand that you need some details to proceed further, however, I'm not comfortable sharing my personal contact details over email due to privacy concerns. Is there any other way we can proceed without sharing such sensitive information?

Also, could you please provide more details about the cargo? What does it contain? And why is it being sent through a special diplomat? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Dear Johnie,

Anyway  since you cannot release your information to me there is no trust
in the business. I think the best thing to do is to forget about it. I
cannot trust my money into the hands of somebody who is afraid of sending
his contact information to me.
Thanks and God bless you.
Paul Andrew.

subject: Re: From: Mr. Paul Andrew
body:
Dear Johnie,

I hope this message finds you well. I understand your concerns about trust, it's indeed a crucial part of any business relationship. However, I believe there are other ways we can establish trust without necessarily sharing personal contact information.

Could you perhaps share more details about the business? What is its nature and how does it operate? Maybe if I understood more about it, I could feel more comfortable with the whole situation.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Johnie
